import React from "react"; import { MDBAccordion, MDBAccordionItem, MDBContainer } from "mdb-react-ui-kit"; import Nav from "./Nav"; export default function About() { return ( <>
If This is a front-end application for movie-ticket booking. It shows many theatre options, show timings. Please click the show that is not started until you cannot find the booking option in movies page, You can check genre of the film, audience rating and no.of people voted, top actors who are acted in the film, plot of the film At any time You can return to Home page by clicking Home option in top Front-end technologies such as HTML, CSS, JS and React to create the user interface and handle client-side interactions. Node.js as the server-side runtime environment to handle server-side processing and communicate with movies API to retrieve information.
Created By: Sasi Chandan
Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/in/bhargav-sasi-chandan-67575a249/"
Github: https://github.com/Sasichandan01"
); }
